843630.name: Project R.A.T.
843630.description:
Take control of Chris P. Ratt, previously a diabetic test subject, who has now been mutated by an exceedingly high dose of cannabidiol into a fully capable super-rodent!

Sling, slip, and slurp your way out of the dankest of labs to sweet freedom!

Key Features:
  • Launch across the lab in your gelatinous form
  • Avoid hazardous materials to survive
  • Make your way through an atmospheric single player experience
  • Student Created Game
843630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
